title: Boston University hires Harvard misinformation scholar Joan Donovan
description: Donovan's dismissal by Harvard earlier this year stunned the academic community that studies social media, which is being assailed by conservatives and Rep. Jim Jordan's subcommittee on the weaponization of the federal government.

title: Elon Musk’s X is throttling traffic to news and websites he dislikes
description: The delayed websites include X’s online rivals Facebook, Instagram, Bluesky and Substack as well as Reuters and the New York Times, all of which Musk previously has singled out for ridicule or attack.

title: 5 ways to save money as streaming gets more expensive
description: Peak TV is over. Here's how to save money and your sanity in the new streaming epoch of paying more for less content.

title: Chinese spies who read State Dept. email also hacked GOP congressman
description: Rep. Don Bacon tweeted Monday that he had been notified by the FBI that his emails had been hacked.
